attributes.action: Introduce exit taxes from UK airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have just returned from holiday in Cuba. On leaving the country, we had to pay 25 Cuban Pesos (about £18.00) per person as an "exit tax".

I am not aware that we in the UK charge such an exit tax, which is therefore unfair on us as a country - can this tax on non-UK resident visitors to our country therefore be introduced?
